channel.title: Posts on Westley Dang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Westley Dang

item.title: what do you want to be
item.description: “What do you want to be when you grow up?” and other ways of asking it. What do you want to be? What do you want to do? Who do you want to work for? What will you want to drive you? What kind of person do you want to be? How do you want to live? Which god will you be devoted to? How do you want to serve?

item.title: not always hottest at the equator
item.description: I was in Sweden and I’m pretty sure that the sun was more intense up there, on account that I tanned faster than when I was in San Diego. My friend begged to differ, arguing that the sun was always most intense at the equator. Well, I don’t know anything about that, except for that my first-grade teacher told me the very same thing. But what I do know are these: The Earth is on a 23.
